long_description: This sporty, easy-to-use, twin-head floor pump features a steel barrel and base. TwinHead hose for both Presta and Schraeder valves means no cumbersome switching of washers. Thumblock lever ensures air-tight seal. Easy-to-read mid-mount gauge with pressure indicator dial (reads up to 160 psi). Padded elastomar grip provides a comfortable hand position while inflating.
short_description: This sporty, easy-to-use, twin-head floor pump features a steel barrel and base.
